articles.title: Cloud-Based DaaS Market Expected to Reach $6 Billion by 2029 as Cost-Effective Alternative to Laptops Grows in Demand
articles.summary: The Desktop as a Service (DaaS) market is experiencing substantial growth, projected to reach $22.7 billion by 2032, driven by cost-effectiveness and operational efficiency compared to traditional laptops. Microsoft (Azure Virtual Desktop and Windows 365), Amazon Web Services, and Citrix are leading providers in this market, which is increasingly adopted for hybrid work models due to its scalability and centralized management.

articles.title: 44 Cheap Product Swaps That You'll Wish You Made A Long Time Ago
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduces affordable alternatives to high-end beauty products, including the Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, Soft Glam Foundation, Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm, and Halo Glow Liquid Filter. Catrice launches the "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener and Magic Shaper Face Cream Palette as budget-friendly options. Dossier unveils the "Ambery Vanilla" perfume, offering a more accessible alternative to YSL's Black Opium.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold7: 5 Key Features & What's New!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable device featuring enhanced durability with aerospace-grade titanium and a hinge tested for over 200,000 folds. The Z Fold7 integrates Gemini Live and a Neural Processing Unit (NPU) for on-device AI, and includes Samsung DeX mode and S Pen compatibility to enable enhanced productivity.

articles.title: Pre-Launch Specifications Revealed: Behind the Scenes Before the Big Reveal
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: The upcoming Google Pixel Foldable is expected to feature significant upgrades. Leaks suggest an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance, brighter displays reaching 3,000 nits, and a doubled optical zoom capability of 10x. Google's official unveiling is scheduled for August 20.

articles.title: Exploring the Volkswagen California: A New Era of Campervan Travel Innovation This title captures the essence of the discussion while highlighting the innovative aspects of the Volkswagen California c
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Volkswagen is offering the California campervan, designed for immersive outdoor experiences and convenient meal preparation. Customers can utilize online platforms and authorized Volkswagen Commercial Vehicles dealers to easily locate and configure both new and pre-owned models, streamlining the purchasing process and can select preferred features and specifications,ensuring the California meets individual needs for adventure and everyday use.

articles.title: Elevate Your Brand's Visuals: Enhance Images for Just $20 Using This Photo-Editing App
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Luminar Mobile launched a new AI-driven photo editing application. It has features such as EnhanceAI, SkinAI, and Erase. It is available for both iOS and Android devices for a one-time fee of $19.99.

articles.title: Enhance Your Brand Image with Affordable $20 Photo Edits Using This Powerful App
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Luminar Mobile emerges as a new AI-driven photo editing tool, offering powerful capabilities for entrepreneurs and small businesses.  This mobile application provides intelligent features like automatic sky replacement, relighting, portrait retouching, and object removal, enabling users to transform ordinary photos into professional visuals and enhance brand imagery from their mobile devices.

articles.title: Samsung launches sleek, durable Galaxy A07 in Nigeria
articles.author: The Eagle Online
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the Galaxy A07, the latest addition to its A series lineup with a slimmer design and splash-proof protection. It features a 6.7' display, 5000 mAh battery, intelligent side fingerprint sensor, and affordable screen repair option via Samsung Care+ registration. The Galaxy A07 is available at all Samsung Experience Stores, authorized dealers, and partner retailers nationwide.

articles.title: Trust & convenience
articles.summary: SAMSUNG has launched the DW60CG550B00ET dishwasher, emphasizing hygiene and efficiency. Key features include hygiene care sterilization, modular baskets for customization, and quiet operation at 44dB. The dishwasher is available for ‚Ç¨479.00 with promotional period starting from August 17, 2025, to September 5, 2025.

articles.title: Semi-automatic coffee machine strikes the perfect balance
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Breville's Oracle Dual Boiler is a semi-automatic espresso machine with commercial-level capabilities and smart automation. It offers features like automatic grinding and tamping, extraction monitoring, and Wi-Fi connectivity for updates. The machine aims to provide professionally made coffee without requiring extensive barista training.

articles.title: Squares and squares of stretchy cheese
articles.summary: Domino's Pizza has introduced a new product called Crispy Pizza.

articles.title: CEOs want their companies to adopt AI. But do they get it themselves?
articles.summary: Companies are integrating AI tools like Gemini, ChatGPT, Creatify, and Replit to enhance efficiency. Executives at Lattice, a human resources software platform, and Headspace, a wellness app, are actively using AI to improve operations and decision-making. These companies are adapting AI tools to integrate into their respective workflow of the companies.

articles.title: A former consultant built a 7-figure Amazon business selling septic pods. He explains why sellers should avoid 'sexy, fad-driven products.'
articles.author: Kathleen Elkins
articles.summary: Alex Yale launched Uncle Todd's, a cleaning brand, with its first product being septic pods on Amazon. Yale aimed to build a larger consumer product brand with plans to expand into retail stores like Walmart, Target, Home Depot, and Lowe's. He selected everyday products that solve problems, focusing on repeat purchases for long-term growth.

articles.title: Ombudsman launches mobile service under 'Public Service Program'
articles.author: Urdu Point
articles.summary: The Punjab Ombudsman is launching a new mobile service under its 'Public Service Program' to bring justice and grievance redressal closer to people. The formal inauguration is scheduled for next week at the regional.

articles.title: Pok√©mon Legends Z-A innovates with real-time battles and Mega Evolution in Lumiose
articles.author: Reda√ß√£o Mix Vale
articles.summary: Pok√©mon Legends Z-A, a new game in the Pok√©mon franchise, is launching on October 16, 2025, for Nintendo Switch and Switch 2. articles.title: The 11 best Amazon deals we found this week: Crest Whitestrips, Beats headphones & more
articles.author: Sarah Vazquez
articles.summary: Amazon is offering discounts on various products including Dyson Airwrap Origin, Bioderma Atoderm Shower Oil, Jackery Explorer 1000 v2 Portable Power Station, Beats Studio Pro Headphones, grace & stella Energizing Under Eye Mask, Crest 3D Whitestrips Professional Effects, Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows, ROVE R2-4K DUAL Front & Rear Dash Cam, Repel Windproof Travel Umbrella, Bissell Little Green Mini Cordless Portable Carpet and Upholstery Deep Cleaner, and DripDrop Hydration Packets. Bissell's new Little Green Mini cleaner, launched this spring, is highlighted as a compact and cordless option for stain removal.

articles.title: AI-generated music sparks industry concern
articles.author: CBS News
articles.summary: Google has launched Gemini 1.5 Pro, an enhanced AI model with longer context windows, and introduced AI-powered summaries and improved collaboration tools for Google Workspace. A limited preview of Gemini 1.5 Pro is available to select developers, with a wider rollout planned later this year.

articles.title: 35 Fast Problem-Solving Products For No-Nonsense Humans
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new and innovative cleaning and personal care products are introduced. These include a foot peeling spray, nausea relief inhaler, laundry stain remover, foaming drain cleaner, space-saving compression bag, Keurig cleaner pods, teeth-whitening pen, and hairbrush cleaning tool. Other products mentioned include Lumify Eye Drops, jewelry-cleaning stick, Tub O Towels wipes, drain snake, car vacuum, garbage disposal cleaner, veggie chopper, SneakErasers, mosquito itch relief patches, Miracle-Gro food spikes, Sprayway Glass Cleaner, SweatBlock wipes, ring can opener, oral rinse, Bottle Bright tablets, Elephant Ear Washer Bottle System, wine wands, Revlon oil-absorbing face roller, gel lint roller, wood polish, paint touch-up pens, washing machine‚Äìcleaning tablets, dishwasher-cleaning tablets, electric wine bottle opener, blind duster, hair identifier spray, and power scrubber brush.

articles.title: GPT-5's Voice Mode Can Hold a Decent Conversation, but Please Don't Talk to ChatGPT in Public
articles.author: Katelyn Chedraoui
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5, its latest generative AI model, featuring an improved advanced voice mode and customizable AI personalities. Free users now have access to the advanced voice mode, while paying subscribers receive higher usage limits. The new features aim to provide a faster and smarter chatbot experience.

articles.title: Amazon's move may take down Instacart and consumers could benefit
articles.author: Dana Sullivan Kilroy
articles.summary: Amazon is expanding its grocery game by offering same-day delivery of fresh groceries to customers in over 1,000 U.S. cities, with plans to reach over 2,300. This expansion puts competitive pressure on companies like Instacart, who saw their shares drop following the announcement. This service allows customers to order items like produce, meat, dairy, and pantry staples and receive them within hours.

articles.title: The Pixel 9 Pro Fold is $600 off ahead of the new model's debut
articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.summary: Google will unveil its Pixel 10 phones, including a new Fold model, on August 20th. The upcoming Pixel 10 Pro Fold might feature an IP68 rating, making it dustproof. Meanwhile, the base 256GB version of the Pixel 9 Pro Fold is on sale for $1,199 at Amazon and Best Buy, 33 percent off its original price.

articles.title: Waterdrop Water Filter review: A game-changer for clean, great-tasting water
articles.author: Al Murillo
articles.summary: Waterdrop Filter has launched the Waterdrop Filter X12 Pro RO System, a reverse osmosis system featuring an 11-stage filtration process, a smart faucet with LED display, and UV sterilization. The system offers dual flow options for purified drinking water and clean water for washing, and aims to reduce plastic bottle usage with a recycling program for used filters.

articles.title: Pyxa.ai Delivers on Its Promise to Creators, Agencies, and Digital Marketers
articles.author: satmin
articles.summary: Pyxa.ai is launching a full Social Media Suite in August, featuring post scheduling, content calendars, platform integrations, and AI assistance for post creation. A smart Marketing Assistant will also be introduced to expedite campaign planning and execution. The company is also expanding influencer style video generation with prebuilt templates.

articles.title: 32 Personal Care Products You'll Wish You Found Sooner
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Several companies are launching or highlighting new products in the beauty and personal care space. I Dew Care is promoting its dry shampoo powder, while SweatBlock offers antiperspirant wipes. Maybelline features a Dark Circles Treatment Concealer, and Revlon showcases its oil-absorbing volcanic face roller, each providing unique solutions for common beauty concerns.

Nike presents Air Forces for classic and comfy style.

These products range from a waterless dry shampoo foam for quick hair refreshment to a Hamilton Beach breakfast sandwich maker for a fast breakfast, a Revlon hair dryer and volumizer for simplified hair styling, and an Instax instant camera for instant photo memories. The focus is on convenience and efficiency in various aspects of life.

IyeOg√© offers support for partner designers and seeks to redefine how the world engages with African design and culture.

articles.title: McDonald's is offering buy one get one free on a classic menu item ‚Äì but you'll have to be quick
articles.author: Emily Mee
articles.summary: McDonald's introduced new menu items, including the Jaffa Cakes McFlurry and Sprite Zero with Green Apple or Mango & Passionfruit flavorings. The fast-food chain also brought back items like Spicy Chicken McNuggets and the Chicken Big Mac. Additionally, the Double Filet-O-Fish was introduced as a permanent menu item, and promotional deals are offered through the McDonald's app.

articles.title: Samsung Z Flip 7 review: I was too young for the original flip-phone era - but I'm totally converted with this retro revival
articles.author: WILIAM HUNTER
articles.summary: Samsung has released the Galaxy Z Flip 7, the latest in its Z Flip series of foldable phones. The phone features a clamshell design, a 6.9-inch AMOLED display, and runs on Samsung's Exynos 2500 processor, and it is available at a starting price of ¬£1,049. The updated model has bigger screens both inside and out, with the outside display growing from 3.6 inches to 4.1 inches, while the inner screen boasts a 6.9-inch display.

articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Lip Smacker introduces Rolly Lip Gloss with fruity flavors. Laneige launches Neo Blurring Powder with blue hyaluronic acid. Nick's introduces Keto Candy Bars, gluten-free treats with no added sugar.

Competitors like UKLASH and Skin + Me also offer hair regrowth products.

articles.title: Samsung offers $250 discount on its latest Galaxy S25 model
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: Samsung is offering the latest Galaxy S25 model for $250 off. This promotional offer is intended to make the price of the new phone more appealing to customers.

articles.summary: The Digital Curve, an SEO agency in Ghaziabad, offers SEO services to help businesses grow online. articles.author: Steve Guntli
articles.summary: Snarf's Sandwiches is now serving sub sandwiches in far Northwest Austin.

articles.title: Online Stock Buying Reviews: Assessing Current Digital Trends in Content Writing
articles.summary: The Ninja Swirl by CREAMi, the latest creation from Ninja, is a new kitchen appliance for crafting both classic ice cream and velvety soft serve. It builds upon the success of the original CREAMi with enhanced functionality including a dedicated soft serve function and 13 one-touch programs, offering a personalized dessert experience.

articles.author: Hedy Khoo
articles.summary: ChaPanda Singapore introduced fresh fruit tea drinks and opened two new outlets. Luli Singapore launched its first outlet with modern beverages rooted in traditional Chinese medicine, including the exclusive Lingzhi Dragon Ginseng. F&N Foods launched F&N Magnolia Limited Edition Earl Grey Low Fat Flavoured Milk in June.

articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 33% discount on the Ultenic U16 Flex Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, reducing the price from ¬£179.99 to ¬£119.99. The Ultenic U16 features 'turbocharged' suction power, an anti-tangle brush head, a bendable tube for cleaning under furniture, and up to 60 minutes of battery life.

articles.title: Tropical downpours possible as we head into the weekend
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers its streaming service through the KENS 5 app, which can be accessed on users' phones.

articles.author: Jaco Van Der Merwe
articles.summary: GWM is launching two new LS variants of the P300 bakkie. These variants feature a 2.4-litre turbodiesel engine, attractive prices (R529 900 for rear-wheel drive and R579 900 for four-wheel drive), and come standard with features like a rear diff lock and a 12.3-inch infotainment display. The purchase includes a seven-year/200 000 km warranty and a seven-year/75 000 km service plan.

The series boasts features like slim design, AMOLED displays with high refresh rates, long-lasting batteries with fast charging, AI-powered tools, and 50MP cameras, with the Pro+ model featuring MediaTek Helio G200 processor and wireless charging capabilities.
